outline:
1. to rejoice, be glad
    1. (Qal)
      1. to rejoice
      2. to rejoice (arrogantly), exult (at)
      3. to rejoice (religiously)
    2. (Piel) to cause to rejoice, gladden, make glad
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to rejoice, gladden, make glad
kjv_def: cheer up, be (make) glad, (have, make) joy(-ful), be (make) merry, (cause to, make to) rejoice, [idiom] very.
strongs_def: probably to brighten up, i.e. (figuratively) be (causatively, make) blithe or gleesome
